doc.field: [ECL] DEBT MAY BE DOWNGRADED BY S/P

- Standard and Poor's Corp said it may downgrade Ecolab Inc's 10 mln dlrs of BBB-plus subordinated debt. The agency cited Ecolab's proposed acquisition of ChemLawn Corp [CHEM] for 370 mln dlr. S and P said there are uncertain returns on such a large investment for Ecolab as well as increased credit risk, with debt leverage rising to more than 60 pct from 25 pct currently. But S and P noted that the acquisition would broaden Ecolab's services. S and P said it would review management's plans to sell assets and use proceeds to reduce debt.
